function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Testing method limitations for viral concentration from water samples","Impact":"Inaccurate concentration may lead to false-negative results and misinterpretation of viral presence in water","Mitigation":"Establish rigorous limits of detection and use recovery controls for accurate viral concentration","Technologies":"Aluminum hydroxide adsorption-precipitation method, PEG precipitation method, centrifugal devices, electropositive membrane concentration","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, water treatment professionals","Owner":"Laboratories, research institutions, water treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Handling SARS-CoV-2 in the laboratory environment","Impact":"Risk of exposure and transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in a laboratory setting","Mitigation":"Use of BSL3 laboratory facilities, strict biosafety protocols, and personal protective equipment","Technologies":"BSL3 laboratory facilities, biosafety equipment","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, facility managers","Owner":"Laboratory management, facility management"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of SARS-CoV-2 presence in water samples","Impact":"Public health risk due to incorrect assessment of viral presence in water","Mitigation":"Validation of testing methods, inclusion of recovery controls, and rigorous quality assurance parameters","Technologies":"Quality assurance parameters, validation protocols","People":"Public health authorities, water treatment professionals","Owner":"Public health agencies, water treatment facilities"}]}
